questions.quote: If you hadn't mentioned anything, I would have been fine. I became obsessed with him.
I knew this was gonna happen some day. It was inevitable. I've known it ever since I was a little kid. I've been waiting for it.
I see,  "I pulled the lever on the machine, but the Clark bar didn't come out!" Exclamation point?
I don't even know Peterman. How the hell am I gonna relax? I'm gonna have to be on all night. I don't like being on, Jerry, I would much rather be off.
Well it was an accident. Right Jerry it was an accident. Ah, she's going to be all right. .. baby, baby, ah, baby.
It was a pleasure doing business with you George, but I'm afraid I have to get going.
Jerry, get menus so when we sit down we can order right away.
No, no, n--Well, you know, I wore 'em for about a month but I couldn't stick with it. No, I need the secure packaging of Jockeys.  My boys need a house!
I can't blame you. I can't believe she never called you back.
What? Jerry, I gave you my blood. Listen to your pulse,  hey buddy-hey buddy-hey buddy...
